Performance Testing: Build Rugged Software

When it comes to testing the performance of software, really, the point is to see what it takes to break it. For mobile solutions especially, a high number of concurrent users can be the downfall of functionality or accessibility. Our performance testing process evaluates software under conditions of extreme traffic or usage to ensure you know the new system’s limits. Any clear bottlenecks will reveal themselves during the examination and can be addressed before launch. Don’t wake up to find you’re the newest trending Twitter hashtag for all the wrong reasons: put your software through testing while you still have the opportunity.

ASKING QUESTIONS

Before testing your brainchild, we’ll get to know it through your eyes. What exactly did you want it to do? What challenges did you face, and what challenges do you think the software faces in real-time?

SHARING INSIGHTS AND FINDINGS

After we’ve finished testing the software, we’ll compile our findings into a detailed, data-driven report of the program’s performance under a wide spectrum of conditions.

SUCCESS THROUGH PROCESS

We strategize a unique testing approach for each new project after establishing baselines of performance and defining key metrics by which its success will be evaluated.

RECOMMENDATIONS FOR NEXT STEPS

In the report, we also include our thoughts on how to address performance failures and what configuration changes might lead to greater success.

RUNNING THE GAUNTLET

We test your software solution to verify its performance under heavy traffic or use and during resource bottlenecks. Every limit in the software’s performance that can be pushed, is pushed.
